sum_repr_mul_repr_mulₛₗ:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₛₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₛₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Write out `B x y` as a sum over `B (b i) (b j)` if `b` is a basis.

Version for semi-bilinear maps, see `sum_repr_mul_repr_mul` for the bilinear version. -/
theorem sum_repr_mul_repr_mulₛₗ {B : «expr →ₛₗ[ ] » M ρ₁₂ («expr →ₛₗ[ ] » N σ₁₂ P)} (x y) :
    ((b₁.repr x).sum fun i xi =>
        (b₂.repr y).sum fun j yj => «expr • » (ρ₁₂ xi) («expr • » (σ₁₂ yj) (B (b₁ i) (b₂ j)))) =
      B x y :=
  by
  conv_rhs => rw [← b₁.total_repr x, ← b₂.total_repr y]
  simp_rw [Finsupp.total_apply, Finsupp.sum, map_sum₂, map_sum, LinearMap.map_smulₛₗ₂, LinearMap.map_smulₛₗ]
#align sum_repr_mul_repr_mulₛₗ sum_repr_mul_repr_mulₛₗ
sum_repr_mul_repr_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Write out `B x y` as a sum over `B (b i) (b j)` if `b` is a basis.

Version for bilinear maps, see `sum_repr_mul_repr_mulₛₗ` for the semi-bilinear version. -/
theorem sum_repr_mul_repr_mul {B : «expr →ₗ[ ] » Mₗ R («expr →ₗ[ ] » Nₗ R Pₗ)} (x y) :
    ((b₁'.repr x).sum fun i xi => (b₂'.repr y).sum fun j yj => «expr • » xi («expr • » yj (B (b₁' i) (b₂' j)))) =
      B x y :=
  by
  conv_rhs => rw [← b₁'.total_repr x, ← b₂'.total_repr y]
  simp_rw [Finsupp.total_apply, Finsupp.sum, map_sum₂, map_sum, LinearMap.map_smul₂, LinearMap.map_smul]
#align sum_repr_mul_repr_mul sum_repr_mul_repr_mul
ext_basis:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₛₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₛₗ[ ] » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Moritz Doll. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Moritz Doll
-/
/-- Two bilinear maps are equal when they are equal on all basis vectors. -/
theorem ext_basis {B B' : «expr →ₛₗ[ ] » M ρ₁₂ («expr →ₛₗ[ ] » N σ₁₂ P)}
    (h : ∀ i j, B (b₁ i) (b₂ j) = B' (b₁ i) (b₂ j)) : B = B' :=
  b₁.ext fun i => b₂.ext fun j => h i j
#align ext_basis ext_basis
